```
$ ./internet-checksum-calculator.py 0001000000000
Input Digits: 0001000000000
Finalized Input Digits: 0000001000000000
Data Sum: 0000001000000000
Final Checksum: 1111110111111111

$ ./internet-checksum-calculator.py 011001100110000001010101010101011000111100001100
Input Digits: 011001100110000001010101010101011000111100001100
Finalized Input Digits: 011001100110000001010101010101011000111100001100
Initial Data Sum: 10100101011000001
Final Data Sum: 0100101011000010
Final Checksum: 1011010100111101
```
